_source: speak;Anna;Colm has a special item in his inventory called a <red>Magic Key.</>|It allows him to open chests from afar!|It restores uses between chapters, so don't be afraid to use it!|Also, one thing to note is that <red>units will unpair from their partner if they are paired up when opening a chest.</>|So keep that in mind!;;;;6
